title: Champion Men's Color Block Full Zip Hoodie
features: Body - 75% Cotton 25% Polyester, Hood/Hood sleeve lining - 72% Cotton 28% Polyester
Full zip front - Front hand pockets

description: This Champion brand Color Block Hoodie is perfect for just about anything. Perfect for warming up for exercise and a great wardrobe staple to throw on when it's cool outside. The Contrast Hood & Sleeves make you stand out while the Full zip front and Front hand pockets keep you warm throughout the seasons. Hooded with drawstrings so you can wear it how you like it. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.
